text: "Rhythm of the Night" is a 1985 song by R&B; group DeBarge and is the title track from their fourth studio album of the same name. It went to number 3 in the United States, Canada and New Zealand, number 4 in the Netherlands and the United Kingdom, number 5 in Australia, Ireland and South Africa and number 7 in Belgium. It was their biggest hit in their career. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:DeBarge songs
title: Rhythm of the Night (song)
